text: She's been captivating crowds around the world as she takes to the stage on her Reputation Tour. But Taylor Swift delighted in some down time as she enjoyed an romantic dinner date with her beau Joe Alwyn in Covent Garden's Hawksmoor steak restaurant inLondon on Wednesday evening. The Bad Blood singer, 28, who has been in a relationship with the 27 - year - old actor since May last year, appeared in the throes of love as she strolled around the streets of the British capital hand - in - hand with her boyfriend.
